labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The player stops immediately after leaving the visible portion of the screen
data.expected_result: The player should continue to play until the message is no longer loaded, as is the case with YouTube videos and such
data.short_description: Spotify embeds stop playing if unfocused (unlike their video counterparts)
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure you are on Canary Web _or_ Desktop Canary **without** Spotify installed locally - Post a Spotify media link (e.g. /track/) - Play the track preview from the embedded player - Scroll so the player is no longer in focus (can be up or down)
